lead_paragraph: RAPPAPORT--Dollsey. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Dollsey Rappaport, beloved wife of the late Seymour Rappaport, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Dollsey's daughters, Nanette Rosenberg and Marjorie Rozman; her sister, Elissa Epstein; her grandchildren and great-grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
